articles.description: Apple Music is increasing the price of its subscription for students in the US, UK, and Canada. Students in the US and Canada now have to pay $5.99 / month, while subscribers in the UK will have to pay £5.99.
articles.content:
Several other countries saw a price increase in May
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Apple Music has raised the subscription price of its student plan in the US, UK, and Canada, as first rep… [+1669 chars]

articles.author: Mahesh Makvana
articles.title: How to Restart Windows 10 - How-To Geek
articles.description: Restarting your Windows 10 PC is as easy as clicking a few options or running a command from Command Prompt. We’ll show you the options available to you to turn your PC off and then back on.
articles.content:
